Boston.Frances Appleton Bridge:
The Frances Appleton Bridge is a pedestrian bridge in Boston, Massachusetts that is scheduled for completion on August 1, 2018. The bridge was named in recognition of the celebrated courtship and marriage of Frances “Fanny” Appleton and Henry Wadsworth Longfellow, after whom an adjacent larger bridge is named.


== Description ==
The Frances Appleton Bridge is proposed as part of the master plan to restore the iconic 1908 Longfellow Bridge across the Charles River between Boston and Cambridge.
